subcult-tv.name: subcult.tv
subcult-tv.description: The hub. This very site. Portfolio, manifesto, signal broadcast.
subcult-tv.longDescription: subcult.tv is the central node of the Subculture Collective network. It serves as our business homepage, project portfolio, zine archive, and Patreon funnel. Built with Vite, React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS with a VHS/punk/gothic aesthetic.
subcult-tv.whyItExists: Every collective needs a signal tower. This is ours.

clipper.name: clpr
clipper.description: A modern Twitch clip curation platform. Discover, organize, and share your favorite clips.
clipper.longDescription: clpr is a Twitch clip curation platform that lets users discover trending clips, build curated collections, and share highlights across the community.
clipper.whyItExists: Twitch clips deserve better discovery. We built the frontend Twitch won't.

cutroom.name: Cutroom
cutroom.description: Collaborative AI video production pipeline. Multi-agent content creation with attribution tracking.
cutroom.longDescription: Cutroom is a collaborative AI video production pipeline where multiple specialized agents work together to create short-form video content. Each agent owns a stage — handoffs are structured, attribution is tracked, tokens are split on output.
cutroom.whyItExists: Video production shouldn't require a studio. We built the assembly line.

subcult-corp.name: Subcorp
subcult-corp.description: Self-sustaining collective of six AI agents running autonomous workflows — proposals, debates, missions, and memory.
subcult-corp.longDescription: Subcorp is a self-hosted multi-agent system — 6 AI agents with native tool execution, autonomous workflows, roundtable conversations, and semantic memory. Built with Next.js 16, PostgreSQL + pgvector, and OpenRouter.
subcult-corp.whyItExists: We wanted AI that collaborates like a collective, not a chatbot.

reddit-cluster-map.name: clustr
reddit-cluster-map.description: Interactive visualization of Reddit community relationships. Explore subreddit clusters and cross-posting patterns.
reddit-cluster-map.longDescription: clustr maps the hidden topology of Reddit — visualizing how communities connect through shared users, cross-posts, and semantic overlap. Navigate the social graph, discover related subreddits, and see patterns in how communities form and fragment.
reddit-cluster-map.whyItExists: Reddit's structure is invisible by design. We made it legible.
